0:
trap 'exit' INT TERM
while [ 1 ]; do
  sleep 600 &
  wait $!
done

curl -s -d "The local restic check failed" -H "Title: Backups" -H "Tags: rotating_light" "http://ntfy.comms.svc.cluster.local/homelab"
curl -fsS -m 10 --retry 5 -o /dev/null "http://healthchecks.monitoring.svc.cluster.local/ping/${HEALTHCHECKS_RESTIC_LOCAL_CHECK_UUID}/fail"

curl -s -d "The remote restic check failed" -H "Title: Backups" -H "Tags: rotating_light" "http://ntfy.comms.svc.cluster.local/homelab"
curl -fsS -m 10 --retry 5 -o /dev/null "http://healthchecks.monitoring.svc.cluster.local/ping/${HEALTHCHECKS_RESTIC_REMOTE_CHECK_UUID}/fail"
